役者絵: (やくしゃえ) - actor print; ukiyo-e print of kabuki actors
役者風情: (やくしゃふぜい) - (yoji) (the likes of) a mere actor
役者馬鹿: (やくしゃばか) - (yoji) good actor who is inept in all other matters; demon for acting who is utterly indifferent to all other concerns; skilled actor who knows little of life; person who excels in one occupation (profession) but lacks simple common sense
役職: (やくしょく) - post; managerial position; official position
役職名: (やくしょくめい) - job title; name of one's position
役職手当: (やくしょくてあて) - executive allowance
彼: (oi/kare) - he , that (indicating something distant from both speaker and listener (in space, time or psychologically), or something understood without naming it directly); that person; down there (i.e. one's genitals); period, menses
彼とか: (カントカ) - something; something or other; so-and-so
彼なり: (かれなり) - his way; peculiar to him
彼の: (かの) - that (someone or something distant from both speaker and listener, or situation unfamiliar to both speaker and listener)
彼のさん: (あのさん) - that person (mainly used in red light districts); you
彼の世: (あのよ) - the other world; world of the dead; netherworld
彼の世千日此の世一日: (あのよせんにちこのよいちにち) - (proverb) a day in life is better than a thousand days in the afterlife; better one day in this world than a thousand in the next
彼の子: (あのこ) - that girl/that kid; you (mainly used by a brothel owner or senior prostitutes when addressing servant girls)
彼の方: (あのかた) - that gentleman (lady); he; she
彼の様: (あのよう) - such; like that; in that way
彼は誰時: (かわたれどき) - dawn (orig. also used in reference to dusk)
彼や是や: (あれやこれや) - this and that
彼や此れや: (あれやこれや) - this and that
彼らの助力に依って: (かれらのじょりょくによって) - by dint of their help
彼を知り己を知れば百戦殆からず: (かれをしりおのれをしればひゃくせんあやうからず) - (proverb) (from Sun Tzu's The Art of War) If you know your enemy and know yourself, in a hundred battles you will never be defeated
彼個人: (かれこじん) - he himself; his personal
彼処: (あこ) - there (place physically distant from both speaker and listener)/over there/that place/yonder; (あそこ, あすこ only)  genitals; that far (something psychologically distant from both speaker and listener)/that much/that point
彼女自身: (かのじょじしん) - herself; she herself
彼奴: (あやつ) - (きゃつ and かやつ are masc.) he; she; that guy
彼岸: (higan) - equinoctial week (quando são realizados os serviços budistas); nirvana
彼岸の入り: (ひがんのいり) - first day of the equinoctial week
彼岸会: (ひがんえ) - Buddhist services during the equinoctial week
彼岸桜: (ヒガンザクラ) - higan cherry (species of weeping cherry tree, Prunus subhirtella)/early-flowering cherry (around the spring equinox); double weeping rosebud cherry (Prunus pendula)
彼岸潮: (ひがんじお) - equinoctial tide; equinoctial spring tide
彼岸花: (ヒガンバナ) - red spider lily (Lycoris radiata); cluster amaryllis
彼岸西風: (ひがんにし) - westerly wind blowing around the time of the spring equinox
彼式: (あれしき) - so trifling; so trivial
彼我: (ひが) - self and others; this and that; both sides; oneself and one's opponent; he and I
彼所: (あこ) - there (place physically distant from both speaker and listener)/over there/that place/yonder; (あそこ, あすこ only)  genitals; that far (something psychologically distant from both speaker and listener)/that much/that point
彼方: (あなた) - beyond; across; the other side; the distance
彼方任せ: (あなたまかせ) - leaving everything to Buddha's providence; depending on others; leaving things to others
彼方方: (あなたがた) - that way/over there; that person/him/her
彼方此方: (アチコチ) - (yoji) here and there/all around/everywhere/throughout/all over; (あちこち, あちらこちら, あっちこっち, アチコチ only) to get things in the wrong order (back to front)/to become muddled up
彼方立てれば此方が立たぬ: (あちらたてればこちらがたたぬ) - It's hard to please everybody
彼是: (かれこれ) - one thing or another/this and that/this or that; (かれこれ only)  just on/around/about/nearly/roughly/almost/round about
彼此: (かれこれ) - one thing or another/this and that/this or that; (かれこれ only)  just on/around/about/nearly/roughly/almost/round about
彼流: (かれりゅう) - his style; her style; his way (of); her way (of)
彼等: (あれら) - those (indicating something distant from both speaker and listener, or something understood without naming it directly); they (of people) (used to refer to one's equals or inferiors)
往々にして: (おうおうにして) - sometimes; occasionally; now and then; from time to time
往き: (いき) - (usu. ゆき)  bound for ...; going (to)
往き交い: (いきかい) - coming and going; traffic
往き来: (ゆきき) - coming and going/keeping in touch/visiting each other; street traffic/highway
往く: (ゆく) - to go/to move (in a direction or towards a specific location)/to head (towards)/to be transported (towards)/to reach; (い sometimes omitted in auxiliary use)  to proceed/to take place; to pass through/to come and go; to walk; (逝く only) to die/to pass away; to do (in a specific way); to stream/to flow; to continue; to have an orgasm/to come/to cum; to trip/to get high/to have a drug-induced hallucination
往って来い: (いってこい) - going back and forth; changing scenery (theatre); fluctuation (e.g. in a market)
往なす: (いなす) - to parry; to sidestep; to dodge
往にし: (いにし) - olden-day; hidden in the past
往ぬ: (いぬ) - to go home; to go/to leave; to pass (of time); to die; to go bad/to rot
往んじ: (いんじ) - olden-day; hidden in the past
往事渺茫: (おうじびょうぼう) - (yoji)  memories of the past events (being, becoming) far and distant
往事茫々: (おうじぼうぼう) - (yoji)  memories of the past events (being, becoming) far and distant
往事茫茫: (おうじぼうぼう) - (yoji)  memories of the past events (being, becoming) far and distant
往代: (おうだい) - ancient times; times of old; time long since passed
往信: (おうしん) - first half of a reply card
往古より: (おうこより) - from times immemorial; from ancient times
往年: (おうねん) - former; one-time; years ago
往復: (oufuku) - fazendo uma viagem de ida e volta, indo e voltando, indo e vindo; correspondência, trocando (cartas); socializando, visitando uns aos outros
往復はがき: (おうふくはがき) - postcard with a reply card attached
往復びんた: (おうふくびんた) - double slap in the face (second slap administered by the return motion of the back of the hand)
往復ビンタ: (おうふくビンタ) - double slap in the face (second slap administered by the return motion of the back of the hand)
往復乗車券: (おうふくじょうしゃけん) - round-trip ticket (for a train, bus, etc.)
往復伝搬時間: (おうふくでんぱんじかん) - round-trip propagation time
往復切符: (おうふくきっぷ) - round-trip ticket; return ticket
往復航空券: (おうふくこうくうけん) - round trip (airplane) ticket
往復葉書: (おうふくはがき) - postcard with a reply card attached
往来: (おうらい) - coming and going/traffic; road/street; association/socializing/socialising/fellowship; recurring (e.g. thoughts); correspondence
往来物: (おうらいもの) - elementary school textbook, used from late Heian to early Meiji periods
往査: (おうさ) - site visit (auditors, public accountants, etc.)
往生: (おうじょう) - death/passing to the next life/dying a happy death; giving up a struggle/submission; at wit's end/flummoxed
往生際: (おうじょうぎわ) - at the point of death; the time to give up
往生際が悪い: (おうじょうぎわがわるい) - not knowing when to give up
